content: I apologize, as an AI language model, I don't have the capability to suggest specific architects or general contractors as it would require me to have access to extensive real-time data about them. However, you can try searching for reputable firms in your area that specialize in historic building renovation by doing an online search, asking for recommendations from colleagues, friends, or family members who have worked with similar firms, or by checking with local historical preservation societies or architecture associations. It's important to thoroughly research and vet any potential contractors or architects you're considering working with to ensure they have the necessary expertise and experience to execute your project to your specifications.
